rooms.name: Two-Car Garage
rooms.description: Spacious garage for two vehicles with ample storage. Vastu-aligned placement in the north-west direction.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open living area adjoining the central courtyard. Placed on the south side to invite positive energy and sunlight.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen with a view of the courtyard for harmony and balance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional design with Art Deco style finishes. Placed in the east as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Accommodating guests. Oriented towards the north-east for optimal Vastu flow.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A central open space fostering natural light and ventilation, serving as a social hub.

openings.description: Large entrance aligned with Vastu principles facilitating positive energy flow.
Direct access to the two-car garage, ensuring privacy and security.
Ample windows for natural light in alignment with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ensuite bathroom. Oriented towards the south-west for balance and privacy.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office integrated within the living space. Located in a quiet corner ensuring productivity.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Attached to the master bedroom for convenience and privacy.

openings.description: Provides access to the courtyard view from the master bedroom, enhancing natural light.
Strategically placed windows for ventilation and energy flow.
